sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import {Row, Col, Image, Button, Card} from 'react-bootstrap' import programs from '../programs' import Programs from '../components/Programs' function ProgramsScreen({ match }) { const program_id = useParams(); const program = programs.find((p) => p._id === program_id.id) return (
Go Back

{program.name}

{program.description}

Age: {program.ageGroup}

) } export default ProgramsScreen
